snippet: A former quarterback for the University of Montana was acquitted Friday of rape in a trial that riveted the city of Missoula.
abstract: Jordan Johnson, former quarterback for  University of Montana, is acquitted of rape in trial that riveted city of Missoula; Jordan maintained sex with another student was consensual.
lead_paragraph: A former quarterback for the University of Montana was acquitted Friday of rape in a trial that riveted the city of Missoula.

headline.seo: Jordan Johnson, Ex-Montana Quarterback, Is Acquitted of Rape
headline.main: Ex-College Quarterback Is Acquitted of Rape in Montana
headline.print_headline: Ex-College Quarterback Is Acquitted of Rape in Montana
